paragraphs.content: Full well is it written of you, by the prophets whom ye have rejected.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Full well is it written of you, by the prophets whom ye have rejected.

paragraphs.content: They testified these things of a truth, and their blood shall be upon you.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They testified these things of a truth, and their blood shall be upon you.

paragraphs.content: Ye have kept not the ordinances of God; for Moses said, Honor thy father and thy mother; and whoso curseth father or mother, let him die the death of the transgressor, as it is written in your law; but ye keep not the law.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Ye have kept not the ordinances of God; for Moses said, Honor thy father and thy mother; and whoso curseth father or mother, let him die the death of the transgressor, as it is written in your law; but ye keep not the law.
